title: Southern Charm: Exes and Oh Nos
description: It's time for the first part of Southern Charm's reunion, where Taylor lets Shep have it. And then she keeps going. And going. And going. Also, Kathryn defends her meatballs and Austen and Oliva try to work out their non relationship. Join Patreon at patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
